title: Itâ€™s not perfect but I still like it!
text: I adore this game, itâ€™s a classic match 3 with satisfying sounds, combos, and effects. The music is wonderful too! Whimsical and playful and dynamic. That said, my only complain is that it takes so long for lives to replenish and free â€œkeep playingâ€ spins to roll over. 48 hours between â€œkeep playingâ€ spins, yet you are encouraged to log in daily. 20 minutes for a single life when you only get 5 to begin with. Itâ€™s also easy to get on a roll and start picking up a bunch of power ups and whatnot which feels good but then when you hit a level thatâ€™s incredibly difficult, you lose it all. Itâ€™s more than a little disheartening.

title: Dishonest app

title: Sudden problem
text:
Iâ€™ve played this game for several years and enjoyed it. Every time I hit one that I enjoy I may do it over and over. Imagine my surprise when I pushed the number for one of my faves and a totally different number appears! When it happened to another fave the same way a day or so later. So I deleted the app and will try another one soon.
Later: I downloaded a new copy of the app and itâ€™s doing the same thing! 37 goes to 26, 1 goes to 20, etc. let me know when itâ€™s fixed!
Reloaded a new app and now itâ€™s doing the same thing (4/30/19). Very annoying as of course Iâ€™ll have to start at One and work up. Please fix!!!

Months later: I had to reload the app because it was frozen. However, the new copy makes me start over at the beginning rather than taking me to where I left off! Iâ€™ll find something else for a while.
